originalText.text: Could not be happier with the results. No way was I scrubbing each tile. They had the entire process done within the hour and prices were reasonable. I will have them back year to scrub my floors. They were filthy and nothing I had would have come out with the excellent results from this service.

originalText.text: Yes. Emmett did an great job. He can do my floors anytime. He brought the floors back to life. ❤️❤️❤️ So did his partner. They both were fabulous together.

originalText.text: Logan was prompt and kept me informed about his . The carpets were done in a timely fashion and they look great! task well done!

text.text: Logan was prompt and kept me informed about his . The carpets were done in a timely fashion and they look great! task well done!

originalText.text: I own a rental property that recently had some water damage. After the dryout process I was left with pulled up carpet and the padding had been removed. The water damage company wanted too much money to finish all the detailed work after the dryout so I had to piece out the project myself. Drapery Cleaning Manhattan was Awesome!! They got right back to me and went to my rental property the next day for the repair. They did a wonderful job and were time and cost efficient. I would recommend this service to anyone.

originalText.text: I had a strange experience with this company. I live a block away from the location advertised on Google but the person on the phone seemed to have trouble recognizing my address when i provided it. They had to ask me several times to confirm a relatively simple address. Then they proceeded to tell me that they don't service my area.... literally a block away from their address.
